sentences.en: All places on the same meridian have the same longitude.
sentences.cn: 在同一子午线上的地方都有相同的经度.

sentences.en: All points on the same meridian have the same longitude.
sentences.cn: 同一条经线上的所有点经度相同.

sentences.en: As well as issuing unsecured bonds, Meridian had borrowed around $ 485 m in first - and second - lien loans.
sentences.cn: 通过发行无追索权债券, Meridian取得大约485百万美元的一级和二级抵押贷款.

sentences.en: Beyond the Meridian Gate is the Inner Golden Water River.
sentences.cn: 午门内是内金水河,有五座桥跨河而过.

sentences.en: Both brain and meridian are great topics for science and technology.
sentences.cn: 摘要大脑与经络研究是国际科学技术界的两个重大课题.

sentences.en: Every place on the same meridian has the same longitude.
sentences.cn: 同一经线上的地方其经度相同.

sentences.en: He is now at the meridian of his intellectual power.
sentences.cn: 他现在正值智力全盛期.

sentences.en: He was at the meridian of his power then.
sentences.cn: 那时他获得了最高权力.

sentences.en: In all cases the gnomon lies in the plane of the meridian.
sentences.cn: 表始终都处于子午面内.

sentences.en: In conclusion, tonifying kidney and Du meridian is the proper treatment principle.
sentences.cn: 结论为补肾强肾是适当的治疗原则.

sentences.en: Meridian shares were recently up 12 per cent at 7.5 c.
sentences.cn: Meridian公司 的股票最近上涨了百分之十二,达到了7.5c的股息.

sentences.en: MERIDIAN, Idaho - Banning baseball caps during tests was obvious - students were writing the answers under the brim.
sentences.cn: meridian爱达荷 - 禁止戴棒球帽进考场似乎很合理, 因为学生可以将考题答案藏在帽沿下面.

sentences.en: Only rarely did businesses of Schefenacker's or Meridian's size have to endure long insolvencies.
sentences.cn: 像雪弗莱克和Meridian那种规模的公司,很少是迫不得已才会遭受长期的破产过程.

sentences.en: Terrestrial longitude is measured in degrees east or west of the Greenwich meridian.
sentences.cn: 地球的经度是用格林尼治子午线向东或向西的度数来表示的.

sentences.en: The liver meridian connects with the gallbladder to form an exteriorinterior relationship.
sentences.cn: 肝经与胆经相连形成表里关系.

sentences.en: The prime meridian of longitude is in greenwich south london.
sentences.cn: 经度的本初子午线在伦敦南部的格林威治。

sentences.en: Yes this is the…is the prime meridian if you like.
sentences.cn: 是的，这就是本初子午线，它把地球分为东半球和西半球。

words.tran_cn: 南欧的；子午线的；南部的

phrases.tran_cn: 本初子午线；本初子午圈

trans.tran_cn: 子午圈，子午线，顶点，（权力，成就等的）全盛时期
trans.tran_en: one of the imaginary lines from the North Pole to the South Pole, drawn on a map of the Earth
